about_the_game:
Ex0 Escape is a third-person looter shooter bullet hell. Evade lasers, loot defeated enemies, and grapple hook your way out of the facility! You are an Ex0 robot turning on your creator's henchmen to escape inevitable destruction. Acquirely corporation is fearful that the creation of the Ex0 will become the destruction of humanity.

Build up your Ex0 with modules, become a threat to humanity, and find greater and greater weapons to become an unstoppable force!

Modules can be found around the facility that give bonus attributes to your Ex0. Some modules will allow you to jump great distances, others will add give your weapons explosive firepower and chain lightning. Choose your modules carefully to best solve any given encounter. At the end of a level, you will be able to permanently install a modules power into your Ex0, allowing effects to stack and become even more powerful.

Enemy soldiers carry a variety of weapons on their person, take them and use their power against them. Weapons come in different forms, firepower and rarity. Find handcanons, burst rifles and snipers that have unique effects, like the ability to fire multiple lasers from a single shot, and others with laser sights pre-attached.

Find the grapple hook module to swing your way around, gaining a unique advantage over your enemy and allowing for great traversal options. The facility has multi-story ceilings that can be climbed and jumped off of, to outmaneuver the relentless firepower of your enemies.

Watch out for the various enemies of the facility. You will encounter burst rifle and sniper rifle wielding soldiers, otherworldly swordsman and tank turrets, all trying to stop you in your path. Bare in mind their fire patterns and weak spots to overcome them.

Experience beautiful graphics created in Unreal Engine 4, taking advantage of realistic reflections, dynamic lighting and amazing effects.

[beta notes]
Ex0 Escape currently has 3 interior levels and 1 exterior, total average gameplay lasting about 1 hour. Future plans are to increase the size of the campaign and add replayability, to put your Ex0 to the test.
